MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Dolgwenith, Caegwyn and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.35PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:45PM on 19th February 2021.
